name: Campfire Cooking
description: Campfire Cooking is a puzzle game about relaxing moments in nature, as you prepare meals over a warm fire. Follow a family's vacation to beautiful and exotic hiking trails. Listen to stories, toast marshmallows, simmer fondue or play with magnets until each meal is ready to eat.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 560+ (or equivalent) Storage: 300 MB available space
